snippet: House Bill 1608 would require Texas law enforcement agencies to obtain warrants and prove probable cause of illegal activity before obtaining cellphone records in their investigations.
lead_paragraph: House Bill 1608 would require Texas law enforcement agencies to obtain warrants and prove probable cause of illegal activity before obtaining cellphone records in their investigations.

headline.seo: Cellphone Records, Officer? In Texas, You May Soon Need a Warrant
headline.main: The Cellphone Records, Officer? You May Soon Need a Warrant
headline.print_headline: The Cellphone Records, Officer? You May Soon Need a Warrant
